sections.title: Mobile & Web applications
sections.content: At Infinitix, we want to push technology forward. That's why we build apps from scratch using the latest technologies. Whether you want your app to be available on iOS, Android, Windows or the web, we have a solution for you.

sections.title: Full-stack solutions
sections.content: We provide full-stack solutions for your projects. We are passionate about what we do and want to come with the best solution that fits your needs.

sections.title: Who are we?
sections.content: We are a young startup founded during the year 2016 and based in Mouscron, Belgium. Our goal is to fully satisfy our customers by collaborating with you and developing what you need.
